mapper.select: select i.* from iam_application_exploration i where i.path like concat(#{path},'%') order by i.id asc

select i.*, ia.name application_name, ia.code application_code, ia.application_category application_category, ia.application_type application_type, ia.is_enabled application_enabled, ia.project_id project_id, fp.name project_name, fp.code project_code, fp.image_url project_image_url from iam_application_exploration i join iam_application ia on i.application_id = ia.id left join fd_project fp on ia.project_id = fp.id where i.path like concat(#{path},'%') order by i.id asc
